form.name: License Name
form.setAsDefaultDescription: Use this license as the system default

upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop license file here
upload.licenseInformationDescription: Enter a descriptive name for this license and configure its settings
upload.uploadDescription: Select or drag a valid license file to upload
upload.infoMessage: The license file will be validated upon upload. Make sure it's a valid license file from your vendor.

createDialog.title: Upload New License
createDialog.description: Upload a new license file to the system

edit.title: Edit License
edit.notFoundDescription: The license you are looking for does not exist.
edit.licenseSettingsDescription: Modify license name and default status
edit.nameDescription: A descriptive name for this license
edit.defaultLicenseDescription: Use this license as the system default
edit.warningMessage: Setting a license as default will remove the default status from other licenses.

delete.title: Delete License
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the license "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
